https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fubFvOkefKQvUwTryWYPeHNroIe.jpg Bamse's friends go on a quest to find the Thunderbell, the ingredient that makes Bamse strong. Meanwhile, the sly Reinard pretends to be a good guy to supplant Bamse as the hero of the town and win the affections of Mickelina. Bamse and the Thunderbell
